title: The new Specialized S-Works Ares road shoes will make you 1% Faster
content:
The new Specialized S-Works Ares road bike shoes are an evolution of more than a decade of shoe designs. The goal? Make the most comfortable high performance road cycling shoes ever. How? By minimizing pressure points on the top of the shoe without giving up their secure hold on your foot. The result is the […]

author: Tyler Benedict
